name: Ghost Nukem
description:
Created by me, Broderick.

This is Ghost Nukem, as you keep playing the enemies spawn more and they get faster. The game is my first game jam, and also my first time utilizing Godot Engine. I usually use Unity so this was an entire learning process for me, and it worked out to be a great experience! Collect ammo dropped by enemies, and dodge them and try to kill as many as you can. Leave how many ghost's you've killed in the comments!

I hope you will all enjoy this short arcade game.
